ch0048_10_gima/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Meeting you
today must mean luck is smiling on me.
ch0048_10_gima/0101_0701_02_10:
Heh... Seems like this ought to ease my boredom
for a little while.
ch0048_10_gima/0601_0701_01_10:
This outfit was custom-made for me by a designer
here on Pasio.
ch0048_10_gima/0601_0701_02_10:
Apparently, the designer took inspiration from
Sharpedo’s nickname—the bully of the sea.
ch0048_10_gima/0601_0701_03_10:
Sharpedo can swim at speeds of up to 75 miles
per hour, and its fangs can rip through sheet iron.
ch0048_10_gima/0601_0701_04_10:
I’ve got to keep my fangs sharp, too, so I can
have the best battles possible.
ch0048_10_gima/0601_0702_01_10:
Sharpedo is quite aggressive, and it’s very
sensitive to the scent of blood. I like those
qualities.
ch0048_10_gima/0601_0702_02_10:
After all, keen senses are crucial for a
risk taker like me...
ch0048_10_gima/0601_0702_03_10:
Even the smallest factors can mean the difference
between victory and defeat. Remember that.
ch0048_10_gima/0602_0701_01_10:
When Sharpedo becomes Mega Sharpedo, it gains
very flashy markings all over its body.
ch0048_10_gima/0602_0701_02_10:
They’re actually old battle scars... I suppose you
could call them medals.
ch0048_10_gima/0602_0701_03_10:
Luck is a factor in any battle, of course, but
experience makes all the difference.
ch0048_10_gima/0602_0701_04_10:
Your experiences here on Pasio should be a good
foundation for you to build on.
ch0048_10_gima/0602_0702_01_10:
Sharpedo’s fangs always grow back no matter
how many times they break or snap off in battle.
ch0048_10_gima/0602_0702_02_10:
Whether you win or lose, you still gain something
from a battle—a chance to become even stronger.
ch0048_10_gima/0602_0702_03_10:
Being part of your team means Sharpedo and I
can show you what we’re truly capable of.
ch0048_10_gima/0603_0701_01_10:
Everyone’s got to play the hand they’re dealt
in life...
ch0048_10_gima/0603_0701_02_10: A good risk taker must keep that in mind.
ch0048_10_gima/0603_0701_03_10:
In the same way, a good Trainer knows not to
face the rough seas of life alone, but with their
Pokémon at their side.
ch0048_10_gima/0603_0701_04_10:
You truly care about your Pokémon, and your
battle instincts aren’t too shabby, either. You might
have a future in the gaming circuit someday.
ch0048_10_gima/0603_0702_01_10:
If somebody wins a battle, then, without doubt,
someone else has lost. That’s the way of battle.
ch0048_10_gima/0603_0702_02_10:
In order to win, a Trainer and their Pokémon must
become stronger together.
ch0048_10_gima/0603_0702_03_10:
Truly great battles demand equally great strength.
You can’t have one without the other.
ch0048_10_gima/0604_0701_01_10:
Surfing the waves with Sharpedo is a great way
to improve your balance and concentration.
ch0048_10_gima/0604_0701_02_10:
The trick is to be in perfect sync with your
Pokémon. If you can do that, even choppy waves
and crosswinds won’t trip you up.
ch0048_10_gima/0604_0701_03_10: Hmm. This is harder to explain than I thought...
ch0048_10_gima/0604_0701_04_10: If you want, I’ll let you ride Sharpedo sometime.
ch0048_10_gima/0604_0702_01_10:
Riding the waves on Sharpedo gives you a
wonderful sense of speed.
ch0048_10_gima/0604_0702_02_10:
You can’t really understand how thrilling it is
unless you experience it for yourself. And once
you do, it sticks with you forever.
ch0048_10_gima/0604_0702_03_10:
The same could be also said of Pokémon battles.
Take you, for example—I can see the light in your
eyes shining brilliantly after every battle.
ch0048_10_gima/0605_0701_01_10:
Watching you up close, it’s quite easy to see
just how much you love Pokémon battles,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0048_10_gima/0605_0701_02_10:
Raising Pokémon, teaching them moves, collecting
items to give them... If you neglect even one of
these areas, victory gets further from your grasp.
ch0048_10_gima/0605_0701_03_10:
But you don’t shirk a single responsibility, and
you still manage to enjoy yourself during battles.
That’s quite remarkable.
ch0048_10_gima/0605_0702_01_10:
Your Pokémon battles are quite interesting,
[Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0048_10_gima/0605_0702_02_10:
They get the crowd cheering and fire up your
teammates to battle alongside you.
ch0048_10_gima/0605_0702_03_10:
That’s why, at times, I think I’d like to battle you as
a rival...
ch0048_10_gima/0605_0702_04_10:
Whenever the opportunity presents itself, I hope
you’ll allow me to battle you.
ch0048_10_gima/1701_0701_01_10:
Somehow I knew you’d be here. When you’re a
risk taker like I am, you develop a sixth sense for
this sort of thing.
ch0048_10_gima/1701_0701_02_10:
You should have this. I’m sure it’ll come in handy
when the odds are stacked against you.
ch0048_10_gima/1701_0702_02_10: I’m curious to see exactly how you’ll use that.
ch0048_10_gima/2501_0701_01_10:
Battle is not a climb to reach a mountain’s peak,
but a journey of discovery across a vast ocean.
ch0048_10_gima/2501_0701_02_10:
No one is invincible. Every Trainer has tasted
defeat at one time or another.
ch0048_10_gima/2501_0701_03_10:
Win or lose, what matters is whether you channel
it into your next experience.
ch0048_10_gima/2501_0701_04_10:
Battle seems simple, but it’s not until you dive in
that you realize just how deep it really is. That’s
why I’ve dedicated my life to it.
ch0048_10_gima/2501_0702_01_10:
The depth of battle is difficult to explain with just
words alone.
ch0048_10_gima/2501_0702_02_10:
If you’d like to learn more about the joy of battle,
I’d be more than happy to lend a hand.
ch0048_10_gima/2501_0702_03_10: Not just as a risk taker, but as a Trainer, too.
ch0048_10_gima/2511_0701_01_10:
The most intriguing part of any battle is the
opponent you’re facing.
ch0048_10_gima/2511_0701_02_10:
Especially on Pasio, where there is no shortage
of intriguing Trainers, each with their own unique
approach to battle.
ch0048_10_gima/2511_0701_03_10:
Since I’m already wearing my sygna suit, I might
as well dedicate myself to enjoying the battles that
can only be experienced on this island.
ch0048_10_gima/2511_0702_01_10:
I like this sygna suit. It captures the unique
ambience of Pasio.
ch0048_10_gima/2511_0702_02_10:
I’d expect nothing less from an outfit inspired by
Sharpedo’s reputation as the bully of the sea.
ch0048_10_gima/2511_0702_03_10:
As a risk taker, I’ve got to do justice to these
clothes. I’ll have to find some impossible odds
to overcome.
ch0048_10_gima/3001_0701_01_10:
When I got up this morning, the thought of all
the battles waiting for me woke me up like a hot
cup of coffee.
ch0048_10_gima/3002_0701_01_10:
I’ve never been much of a morning person...
Unless I’ve got a Pokémon battle waiting for me,
of course.
ch0048_10_gima/3003_0701_01_10:
If you skip a meal, you might not be at full
strength when you need it. It sounds like common
sense, but it’s easy to forget.
ch0048_10_gima/3004_0701_01_10:
I was thinking of heading to the beach. For some
reason, I’ve always been drawn to the sound of
the waves.
ch0048_10_gima/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s time to get out on the town. When you live
and breathe competition like I do, the darkness of
night is no obstacle to battling.
ch0048_10_gima/3006_0701_01_10:
Imagine—a one-night-only, winner-takes-all
tournament. I’d jump at the chance to compete in
something like that.
